sqlMap.insert: insert into SYS_MESSAGE_REMIND (ID,XXNR,XXLB,YWURL,FSR,FSRDM,FSSJ,FSRSSDW,FSRSSDWDM,DXZT,JSLX,JSR,JSRDM,JSRSSDW,JSRSSDWDM,SFCK,CKSJ,XXBT,DKFS,TXRQ,YWID,YWLX) select SEQ_PK.NEXTVAL as ID,#sysMessageRemind.xxnr# as XXNR,#sysMessageRemind.xxlb# as XXLB,decode(#sysMessageRemind.ywurl#,null,null,#sysMessageRemind.ywurl# || SEQ_PK.CURRVAL) as YWURL, #sysMessageRemind.fsr# as FSR,#sysMessageRemind.fsrdm# as FSRDM,#sysMessageRemind.fssj# as FSSJ,#sysMessageRemind.fsrssdw# as FSRSSDW, #sysMessageRemind.fsrssdwdm# as FSRSSDWDM, #sysMessageRemind.dxzt# as DXZT,#sysMessageRemind.jslx# as JSLX, '' as JSR,'' as JSRDM,t.ORGNAME as JSRSSDW,t.ORGCODE as JSRSSDWDM, #sysMessageRemind.sfck# as SFCK,#sysMessageRemind.cksj# as CKSJ,#sysMessageRemind.xxbt# as XXBT,#sysMessageRemind.dkfs# as DKFS,#sysMessageRemind.txrq# as TXRQ,#sysMessageRemind.ywid# as YWID,,#sysMessageRemind.ywlx# as YWLX from (select distinct a.ORGCODE,a.ORGNAME from ORG_ORGANIZATION a where a.ORGCODE in ($orgCodeCondition$) and a.XT_ZXBZ = '0') t
